title: KDogs Arcade Returns to JAFAX!
content: KDOGS ARCADE has been providing console and Japanese style arcade games for conventions since 2002. Headquartered in Ohio, they've supplied video games for various game rooms to many different conventions. The owner has always loved music and rhythm games and strives to provide an experience that cannot be recreated at home. They also provide top notch support and love to teach people how to play the games they provide. Need help or have a question about a game? Find a KDOGS ARCADE staff member and ask them when at JAFAX this year!
